 That isn't Duna... If you look at the texturing, that Kerbal is pretty clearly on Kerbin (I'd know that grass anywhere). And the surface of that object is pretty obviously the Mun, orange coloration aside. It looks exactly what a lunar eclipse looks like (ie. when a moon is in the shadow of its parent body).
